creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Female nude seen from behind as she leaves her bath, with her attendant waiting nearby holding a towel. Not signed. No marks.
inscription:
Recto: SOX / L.D. 39-  / LD 39 / 10: etat 5/17 La sortie du Bain [two Illegible letters, possibly E, K] orig de Degas $250 (dollar figure is superimposed over illegible erasures) | 
Verso: [LD 39 x of xvii / yt / Peg]
provenance: Passed down through unidentied family members to Ami Ladd Vitko, Long Lake, Minn.; acquired by MIA, 1990. Previous owner stated that the print had belonged to her great-grandmother, who was thought to have been one of Degas's studio models.
title: La Sortie du Bain
